text: Sore kara (furyō no) shison ga, kare-ra no ato o tsuide keiten o keishō shitaga, kare-ra wa gense no munashī mono o uketotte,`(don'na koto demo) kanarazu watashi-tachi o o yurushi ni narou' to itte ita. Soshite moshi onajiyōna tamawarimono ga kare-ra ni kureba,(mata) sore o ukeireru. Arrā ni kanshi shinri no soto, katatte wa naranai koto wa,(anata gata no) keiten de no yakusokude wa nakatta no ka. Shikamo kare-ra wa, sono naka ni aru koto o manande itade wanai ka. Omo o osoreru mono ni totte wa, raise no sumai koso mo sugurete iru. Anata gata wa rikai shinai no ka
